name: The Killing Game Show
description: The Killing Game Show is a run and gun shooter game developed by Raising Hell Software for the Amiga and Atari ST. It was released in 1990 and published by Psygnosis. It was re-released later under the name Fatal Rewind for the Sega Genesis and published by Electronic Arts. The main character of the game later made cameos in Leander and Wiz 'n' Liz.
